column1: Frár was a Dwarves of Erebor.
Frár was part of Balins Colony to reclaim Moria. Their mission at first seemed successful
column2: and Balin went so far as to claim the title Lord of Moria. This all changed in their fifth year there. On November 10th
column3: the Orcs came up the Silverlode and killed Balin while he was alone
column4: and unaware and looking into Mirrormere. The Dwarves fought back but  eventually lost East-gate and First Hall.

column1: The Orcs made it across the Bridge of Khazad-dûm and there was a Battle of the Second Hall
column2: and Frár and his companions Lóni and Náli died bravely while the rest of the colonists retreated.

column1: Frár is a dwarf from the Völuspá. His name most likely means "swift".Chester Nathan Gould
column2: "Dwarf-Names: A Study in Old Icelandic Religion"
column3: published in Publications of the Modern Language Association of America
